title: 2019 Championship Sunday Preview
itunes:title: 2019 Championship Sunday Preview
description:
In a room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling – react to the upcoming AFC and NFC Championship bouts! Will the new two-pronged rushing attack of Todd Gurley and C.J. Anderson be enough to silence the Saints in the NFC Championship game (5:00)? Plus, is there some lock up strategy abound? After, the heroes, namely Marc with a ‘C’, provide a WTA update (22:25) and lastly, TB12 and Mahomes clash for the second time this season in the AFC Championship game (25:50)!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
